place_description: Sit-down coffee shop, retail / wholesale bakery located in the heart of Cornelius. We offer individual cakes & tarts, plus large cakes/cheesecakes/tarts, custom cakes, wedding cakes, eclairs, cookies, blondies & brownies, hand pies, cupcakes, vegan sweets, croissants, the best almond croissants, donuts, dessert waffles and so much more!

reviews_data.review_text: Logan is an AMAZING baker!!  Can't say enough about her creativity and talent.  Ordering was a breeze for my husband's 70th birthday cake.  Thanks to everyone at Coffee Republic & Bakery in Cornelius!

Great coffee spot.
Their coffee is our favourite in Cornelius - but small and pricey.
They also have some good bakery, particularly the chocolate eclair, but way over priced.
Staff could be more energetic and friendly - very cold, and will not engage into any conversation.
Order, pay, remain silent, and drink.
Ester and CJ and Katie are awesome, always quick service and excellent coffee!

GREAT Cafe. I got a turkey,egg, cheese english muffin. everything looked good!! great atmosphere, FANTASTIC service.
A place i'll definetly be back to when i'm in the area.

I had late vanilla and lavender, and my hubby had Aztec Mocha. Omg, that was out of this world. Also, a green smoothie is a must. The place is clean and perfect for an afternoon hang out or for doing some work on your laptop
Their key lime pie is the best I've ever had. Also got their matcha lemonade which was really good! Will definitely be going back!
The best!

I really like their coffee and peanut butter bars. However, the last two times I went to the store, I was disappointed in regards to the size of the peanut butter bars. They made them with much less thickness compare to before. There is barely a substance of the peanut butter on them. The price remained the same though.

I am obsessed with their Mediterranean   quiche is here they were amazing! sugar-free iced vanilla latte with oat milk was also delicious! The strawberry filled danish was amazing! The staff here is very friendly, there's a ton of space to study or work here, definitely worth visiting!
Absolutely love coming to this location. Esther is always a pleasure to see and speak with! Appreciate you guys!
This is hands down one of the best coffee shops in the area! Food, drinks and customer service - everything is excellent here. The atmosphere is also very cozy and relaxing.
Please get your cake from Logan,  she is absolutely TALENTED! She will meet every single one of your needs are more with her designs! I wouldn't recommend anyone else in the Lake Norman area!!

Stopped in for coffee and because their display case was filled with goodies we ended up getting cupcakes and breakfast sandwiches. The red velvet cupcake was so moist and the icing was not overly sweet.  Staff was super friendly.
The vanilla sundae cupcake I get was fantastic.  What a great baking department.  Keep up the creative options.
Baked goods are very yummy and the staff is friendly and helpful. Have a feeling I'll be crossing the parking lot from my office building a lot and picking up some goodies.

This bakery was soooo good! I tried the chocolate beignet, strawberry beignet, caramel cookie, and chocolate chip cookie and you could tell they were fresh and the beignet's especially, just melted in my mouth. They even had little samples of a peanut butter cookie that was delicious. Did not try the coffee. The guy working there was super helpful and friendly. Will return!!
Not as great as before

I had a very last minute rush order for my job in Cornelius. The person I spoke to on the phone was very polite and was able to work with me and guarantee my order will be ready just in time for the Easter egg hunt. The families loved the cookies that were freshly made for the occasion. I recommend everyone to coffee republic & bakery. Definitely will be coming back to get treats for my daughter 2nd birthday in April.
Disgusting coffee, disgusting food, bad management I asked for a manager and they are never there??? Owners don't care abt their customers only care abt their teslas and range rovers they drive lol

Cute coffee shop which Cornelius is lacking. However, they need real coffee mugs for those who like to sit have a coffee with a pastry. Great selection of pastries and baked goods , coffee was good and they have heavy cream. Will definitely come here often but will still push them to get real mugs.

Really wanted to like this place & support a local business (Cornelius needs a good coffee spot other than Starbucks, this is not it). Expensive for what you get, food is pre-frozen just like Starbucks, but smaller portions. Ordered the quiche to-go, it was still frozen in the middle after they heated it. Coffee was average.

Omg this place was so good ! I was just shopping around and I was FAMISHED ! They have breakfast sandwiches and danishes also so many sweets ! The Primary baker ( Priya ) was very helpful by recommending some things and I even tried something new and delicious! The Spinach & Feta Danish as well as a Matcha Latte and they both were outstanding! Will definitely be visiting here as often as I can

$7 cappuccino that was a small coffee with all foamed milk? I know you're paying for the space but don't pass that on to the customer. I don't like Starbucks either but at least it's at least filled up with coffee.
Pretty good cup of coffee!

Just came in at 5:41pm some guy with clack short hair was working everything I asked him about he did know what it was I asked him is this the only bear claw he said yes if you see one whole time while I was standing there looking around. He did not interact with me at all  he was cleaning making sure he gets out at 6 pm when they close do not come here terrible service

Some of the tasiest coffee I've had. The main lady is wicked sweet and knows what she's doing. I got the Grinch and my hubby got the Naughty list specialty drinks. We were satisfied with everything. Inside is clean and eye catching. Service is lovely.
Not a good vegan option. Only one vegan choice, peanut butter energy ball and the cashier didn't know the difference between vegan and gluten free. Mediocre overpriced drink.
This place is so special! Esther, Lindsay and Priya go out of their way to be so kind every Saturday!

Today was my first time at this location and I'll certainly be back! The Huntersville location is closer so the Cornelius location is a bit out of the way but worth the drive. I don't like super sweet coffee (like some of the big franchises) and theirs was perfect! It's very nice in there as well, super laid back and any place with Anthony Bourdain and Jimi Hendrix on the wall are pretty cool in my book.

Also, they get 10 stars for service, everyone was nice and the young man that helped me made sure my coffee was to my liking and offered up front to remake it if it wasn't.

Iced hazelnut latte with Oatmilk is 8.60, coffee taste burnt and can't even taste the flavoring. Starbucks is pricey but cheaper than here. Spent 39.84 on garbage. Very disappointed. They don't even display prices on the menu which is extremely odd.

Beautiful space with amazing coffee and tea options!  The snacks they offer are very delicious as well.   The service was friendly and helpful when trying to decide what to order from all the amazing options.

Love that they have Vegan menu .
Good atmosphere to relax and enjoy a cup coffee
Only have gotten coffee here, the calm bean latte. It's vanilla and lavender flavor and it's so delicious, I'm hooked! Cute little place, and the baristas are nice every time I visit.
Cute spot.  Room to sip coffee and work from my laptop comfortably.  I had an ultimate chai, light in the sweetness, with an energy ball.  Both good.

Main Street Bakery and Coffee is our go-to coffee shop! We love the Main Street Huntersville location, so we were more than thrilled when Main Street in Cornelius opened. While still working (or should I say eating) our way through the bakery menu, the banana bread is a must! Be sure to pick up a bag of coffee while you're there from Disco Coffee Roasters- it's USDA organic which is a huge win! You can't help but fall in love with this shop and everything they offer. Main Street Bakery and Coffee is a must when visiting Lake Norman!

I walked in just to get a fork not to buy anything. There was no-one else there and I said I was not going to buy anything but the owner was still very nice to me, I am 14 BTW, and she even gave be a free brownie and was fine with me taking the fork, 100% one of the most hospitable establishments I have ever been to. It is clear that they don't do it for the money but actually care about their customers.

Nice looking cafe and friendly employees but, their croissants and some of their bakeries are very dry, definitely not fresh to me and I tried their different croissants in different days. Also, almond croissant has a taste of orange which I didn't like. Visually everything looks very delicious but taste is not convincing.

I used to like their stuffed croissants, especially those with cream and strawberries.  Those were freshly made. However,  when I came in and purchased a chocolate cream stuff croissant and a cheese Danish, they tasted totally different. I don't believe those were freshly made. For such a high price, >$7, I would expect a better quality. Not sure I will come again.

A heaven for coffee lovers!"The coffee at Main Street Bakery & Coffee is taken seriously. The baristas are real artisans who always make the ideal cup of coffee. Their assortment of coffee is outstanding, offering a variety of mixes and brewing techniques. You may find your ideal brew here, whether you like smooth pour-overs or espresso.

A neighborhood treasure!"" Main Street Bakery & Coffee has become a beloved spot in the community. As soon as you step inside, you can feel the sense of belonging. It's a place to connect with friends, enjoy delightful treats, and savor a great cup of coffee. This neighborhood gem is a must-visit for both locals and visitors to Cornelius, NC.
Delicious coffee, friendly staff, scrumptious treats, and a welcoming atmosphere! Definitely a must-visit!

First of all I'll start with the thing I ALWAYS look for first-- customer service, 0 stars. My latte was fine but banana bread was DRY and not flavorful, danish was--the bread part was chewy and weird--a bakery should have tasty baked goods! These only LOOK good and cost too much considering the taste is sorely lacking. I won't be back. Haven't tried the berry one yet, I'll pass, but the person who tried it said it was like a dry croissant. I suspect my danish was leftovers from another day...if not it's just bad baking. Either way it's bad.
Staff was very friendly and the coffee was great. The pastries tasted a bit old though and didn't justify their quite high price.

Got the special "The Banaza". It's fairly new, plus the staff. I loved my drink! I added in 1 shot of espresso  I think the girl who made mine did a great job!
Thank you! Will be back

Heaven for pastry lovers!"" Main Street Bakery & Coffee is a paradise for those with a sweet tooth. Their pastries are baked to perfection - light, fluffy, and bursting with flavor. Pairing them with a cup of their expertly brewed coffee is pure bliss. You'll find it hard to resist going back for more!

A true gem of Cornelius!"" Main Street Bakery & Coffee is a delightful place to start your day. The aroma of freshly baked goods fills the air, and the coffee is expertly brewed. The staff is friendly and attentive, making you feel like a valued customer. Don't miss out on their mouthwatering pastries, they're simply divine.
I love this place!!! Great fresh pastries, great coffee and most importantly great service!!
We love going to Main Street bakery!!!! The food taste so fresh, the latte's are great and the workers are so friendly.
Love the chocolate croissants !! I would eat them everyday if I could
Main Street does not disappoint!! The best coffee in town hands down. The staff makes you feel right at home. If you haven't tried this local spot yet you are missing out!
I just moved to the area and this bakery has become my go to!   Another few weeks and I'll have tried everything lol.  You'll definitely love it
Great coffee. Great staff. Wonderful addition to the area.

I definitely enjoy the coffee! Service was great as well. However, the eclairs tasted like the ones I get at the grocery store.

I keep coming back because I love the workers, but the prices make it hard to want to go everyday.
We tried the iced matcha latte, cinnamon roll, and chocolate croissant - which were all great! The staff was very friendly as well.
Love this place! Stopped in when I was in the area, the barista was very friendly and helped me decide on what to order. The croissant was delicious, melt in your mouth!!! Highly recommended.

Main Street coffee is top notch.  I was in the area from CT and it was just a spectacular shop from the coffees hot and iced down to the hand made pastry's ! Try the blackberry crumb one of the best I ever had !
The best cupcakes, pastry  and coffee! Clean and friendly shops! Very welcoming!

Si pudiera darle menos de 1 estrella lo haria. Hoy fui temprano por un cafe entusiasmada porque en fotos y el lugar en si es bonito, cuando llegue estaba solo porque era temprano y las 2 personas que estaban trabajando ahi atendieron MUY MAL sin animo de trabajar en absoluto, el cafe demasiado malo muy malo era mas agua que cafe! Que decepcion... NO LO RECOMIENDO muy mala experiencia!

Couldn't find a way to rate on Uber Eats, so I am here! The coffee and food (quiche and blueberry muffin) were delicious! My order even came with some stickers & a note - Thank you for the awesome customer service and attention to detail.

Great place all around---food, coffee, atmosphere, service. I like the vibe and consider this spot a treat in every way. Vegan- friendly too. The vegan white cake with coconut whip cream and fresh strawberries that I ordered for my birthday was delicious and beautiful. Could not have been more pleased.

I finally for the new Main Street Bakery and Coffee. I have frequented Main Street Coffee in Huntersville for years, so it was nice to see this new location with the bakery. The shop is clean and very nice. As I perused the pastries everything looked so sweet and decadent. I purchase a sticky bun, a cinnamon roll, a chocolate chip cookie and an almond croissant. Everything was PERFECT. The cookie was full of chocolate. It was clearly great quality chocolate and the salt on top just enhanced the amazing flavor, while also keeping the sweetness perfect. The croissant was flakey and full of almond flavor. Again, not to sweet, but the perfect balance and the buttery flakiness I expect. I was really concerned that the sticky bun and cinnamon roll would be way too sweet. Let me just say that the bakers clearly know what they're doing. The sweetness was perfect and the flavor off the chart! They told me to put them in the microwave for 10 second, and it was like it had just come out of the oven. If you want fantastic pastries, or just a cookie and coffee I highly recommend stopping in. Great food, great coffee and fantastic service!
Quality coffee and baked goods. Perfect place to catch up with friends or work/study with laptop (plenty of outlet). Super chill vibe
All products are nicely displayed, plus they have also butter in many.
The PB&J croissants are amazing!  Definitely the best croissants in the area.  Their bakery items are well worth the calories.
I always have the best experience here! Staff is incredibly sweet & best coffee in town!

I tried to like it, I really did because I work right across the street. The food is good but its just so pricey. Latte is ok but over $5 and that is if you are lactose tolerant, otherwise you are at $7. The worst though is the service. The woman that has worked there before and still does just can't smile or get herself to say hello, goodbye, let alone a Thank you.

Banana bread was delish!
Service by Gabe was great, I really enjoyed my latte. Will come again :)

Main Street has become one of my favorite spots for meetings, workdays, and pick-me-up's!

Delicious food (my personal favorites being their Quiche & Chocolate Chip Muffins) and downright tasty beverages from their Salty Dog, to their Morning Buzz!

I don't know that my words can do this place Justice so you might as well go try it for yourself.

And if you get the chance to be served by Gabby (hopefully that is the correct spelling), your day will be made!

This location is the former Bakery 28. If you are familiar with Main Street Coffee in Huntersville, it is the same brand!

My mother-in-law had a doctor's appointment in the area and she was in the mood for something sweet after her procedure, so we popped in.
I was curious about what replaced the former bakery.
We met Esther & Jessica (who introduced herself as their executive pastry chef) she is a sweetheart & her pastries are really a work of art. You can feel the love she has for baking.

Let's talk about first impressions: this space is very inviting.

The baked goods are displayed like you are in a French bakery. We had just had coffee so I picked up an organic milk to have with the almond croissant. Delicious!

This would be a great place to have a meeting. They have the space to accommodate & they are ready and willing to help organize any event you have in mind.

I would suggest stopping by for an after dinner coffee & sweet.

Check out the pics and videos!

Come in & treat yourself! Enjoy!

Main Street Bakery & Coffee on Catawba is the perfect stop for a delicious coffee drink or smoothie, and don't leave without a Nutella Coffee Cruffin, Pecan Sticky Bun, Vegan Chocolate Chip Banana Bread, Vegan Blueberry Scone, or heck splurge and take them all to the office, or home. You will be AMAZED by Jessica Walters, Exec Bakery Chef's artistry in her OH SO YUMMY TREATS!

Bakery 28 is the bee knees! The staff is always so friendly and their cookies ARE. TO. DIE. FOR!!!

*when this location was Bakery 28 was when it was good... however, now that it is Main Street Coffee and bakery- it's awful. Highly disappointed in the pastry options and the staff.

I really wanted to love this place but I was sold two stale and inedible pastries when they just brought out fresh ones from the back. At the high price point, they should not be selling such low quality items. The girls at the counter are also not very pleasant. I gave two stars because the croissants are great but I'm not sure they are worth returning for.
The cashier working tonight (I unfortunately did not get her name) was wonderful. She recommended the chai and the chai was delightful. A great atmosphere and we will definitely be back.
I am not vegan but love their peanut butter vegan bars and their sticky buns!
Not sure about rest but they should not bother making coffee... pathetic taste
Main Street created a beautiful catering order for my business and I could not have been more impressed with the customer service and offerings. Best pastries and fresh coffee/tea around.
Best coffee and pastry shop in town. My husband and I love this place. Be sure to check it out!

Stopped by while visiting next door. Looking for pastries for breakfast tomorrow. They didn't disappoint! The sticky bun was oozing with buttery, cinnamon-y Carmel sauce with a pleasant about of walnuts. It was by far the best I've had in years!

This establishment cannot be considered a genuine bakery as their prices are exorbitant. A muffin costs a staggering $5.35, and adding oat milk to any beverage comes with an additional charge of $1.35. A simple latte and muffin combo amounts to a jaw-dropping $15 or more. While I understand that inflation has affected prices, this seems like blatant price gouging. Quality is below average too.

3/5/2023 Replying to the owner: It seems evident that the owner cannot handle criticism and doesn't value their customers since they seem to prefer us going to Starbucks instead. I'm curious as to why there's an additional charge of $1.35 for oat milk. Did they craft it by hand in the back? Despite being new to Cornelius, the establishment already gives off negative vibes. I regret spending my money here and suggest that the arrogant owner takes their attitude elsewhere.

Their website does not reflect their business. Went in as they mentioned cakes, cupcakes, etc with gluten free options. This is not what I found... mostly breakfast pastries and no gluten free options. Staff seemed uneducated  if anything was gluten free and seemed confused when I mentioned the website.
We used to buy all of our holiday deserts here but haven't been back since the change in ownership.
They took my order for my daughter's birthday cake and I went by today and they are out of business

Very nice bakery. A little plain atmosphere but nice.  I did think it was sad that they had to ask people to be respectful and patient and remind them to say please and thank you!   That is unacceptable PEOPLE!  We all know how to act. How old were we when our parents taught us to respect Folks???  Get it together Cornelius

One of the best cakes I've had ever. The staff were all so nice and helpful and created the perfect cake for our baby shower. You definitely should shop here!

Update 11/5/22: I emailed the Bakery a picture of a Harry Potter cake I wanted to have made for my wifes birthday. The price seemed reasonable and the result was absolutely perfect. Practically identical to the original picture, with some improvements. 10/10 satisfied and will buy again soon.

My neighbor surprised us with a few cupcakes as a thank you. They were so delicious that I never would have guessed they were dairy free and vegan!
You can call a couple days in advance for a special order of these I found out. We have already bought them again!

The owners are first class and very personable.
Also they made my aunt's 80th birthday party cake which was delicious! And beautiful

Placed order on Thurs. for pickup on late Sat. as did not need the goods until Sunday afternoon. Due to complications at the bakery (emergency causing hospital trip) they closed early Sat and I was not able to pick up. Owner called and said she would be coming in to work early Sunday and since I didn't need them 'til Sunday I could pick up then. Opening up early on a Sunday to get work done is an owner trying to meet customer demands.
The almond croissants are the best I have ever tasted!
They can make almost anything gluten free.  Amazing for our family

Went there this morning and got a blueberry scone and a s'mores latte. The scone was pretty good, but the coffee was really bitter and you couldn't tell it had any added flavor in it.  My boyfriend got a mocha and it tasted exactly the same as my specialty drink.  I would not come here for the coffee. There are a lot of better options nearby.

Also, they do not currently offer any of the sandwiches on their menu. When asked about it, they said that it is part of their old menu and no longer available.

Sooo sad that they switched owners! This is NOT the friendly owner of the past...
Went in for gf vegan cupcakes and was told that all of the varieties were not in the case yet because it was early. They offered to make us an assorted 6 pack along with offering to put aside lemon bundt cake for us. (Didn't even realize they had this) She wrote down our preferences and took down our phone# in case there were any issues, we asked for the total but was told to just pay when we came back later.
Called at 2 to let them know we'd be in at 3:30 to grab our order and was told by the NEW owner that they don't take orders that aren't pre-paid. Tried to discuss the previous conversation and was abruptly cut off and told that they had no order for us, they don't hold items without payment and that we would just have to get what was left in the case. She was huffing into the phone with frustration as I continued to explain that we had been loyal customers for quite some time prior to her taking over, and that we would have been more than happy to prepay when we were there that morning if we would have been told, additionally since they had our name and phone number, a call would have been appreciated so we could have taken care of payment right away even if over the phone. She definitely appears to have quite a large chip on her shoulder and seems to not have the ability to effectively communicate without getting angry, frustrated and defensive. Her inability to communicate in a professional manner, her inability to provide any solution other than to say "so what do you want me to do about it" and her lack of ability to provide any resemblance of customer service is going to catch up with her...if it hasn't already.
C    Cvs    D
I love love this place! There almond croissants are so amazing, I'd never had one until I tried this cute place out. But now I'm obsessed! Don't walk run here!
Amazing selection, including gluten free and vegan.
I walked in no one greeted me I stayed to order still no greet I walked right out I would not recommend this place to anyone !!
Day old chocolate croissant was not good and minimal chocolate inside. The almond croissant was good. Prices high for amount of provided.
This bakery is so cute! I picked up goodies for my team this morning. Chocolate croissants, blueberry muffins and a latte for myself! They have a beautiful space and friendly staff.

I've been supporting this local bakery lately and I am ALWAYS impressed with the fabulous baked goods not to mention the professional set up and cozy atmosphere.

We are so fortunate to have this very high end bakery in our back yard Cornelius! Special special special!!

Hands down my favorite bakery in Cornelius/Huntersville/Charlotte areas.  They have very refined French bakery style pastries.  The wedding cakes look amazing.  I love all the deserts there including the breakfast croissant sandwiches.  I go there in the morning for the breakfast sandwiches that are fairly priced.

My husband and I like to find coffee shops where we can sit and play board games while eating good desserts and baked goods. The bakery shop is a cute, clean, with a great variety of desserts, pastries and coffee. It has indoor sitting; a vegan and gluten free selection of desserts; breakfast croissants, and lots of options for coffee. I had the chocolate mousse, breakfast croissant and an oat milk late. All were great.  If you are around the area is worth visiting them.

HEAVEN ON EARTH!  I just ate an (ok, fine, another) almond croissant......first thoughts.....if you were on death row this should be your last meal (well, this almond croissant and 9 or 10 other scrumptious treats from Bakery 28) so you would at least get to experience heaven once.  The light airy layers baked to perfection with awesome crunch and delectable flavor there are simply no words that do justice to the perfection which these almond croissants are made.  Trust me, if you eat one, and then decide next weekend you are going to get some more, it may be the only thing you can think about for a week.  And I double dare you to see one, pick it up and say you are just going to take a bite and save the rest for later.

Keli goes above and beyond on customized orders (designing a birthday cake for a special occasion), consistently provides for your special requests/orders and the showcases are eye stopping.  Every stop in reminds me of the finest bakeries in Paris and Europe.

ROCK ON!!!  NOTE TO CUSTOMERS, per the website and I can attest to this---the croissants sell out.  Place an order the day ahead and it will be met!  Two neighbors in my condo complex will be in heaven shortly with the treats I'm bringing them from Bakery 28.

SO GLAD to have such a high quality bakery in Cornelius NC!!!!

To everyone at Bakery 28 from finger puppet Steve--May your 2022 be filled with health, happiness, adventure, prosperity, and peace.

I cannot be happier with Bakery 28. I first started coming here for the amazing desserts and pastries. Then, I decided to order my wedding cake from here. Keli is so sweet and so amazing to work with. It made my wedding day much more stress free knowing Keli cared so much and would do a wonderful job. I also ordered custom cookies for our wedding as well. Everything turned out amazing and I couldn't be more thankful. Thank you Bakery 28 team!

Keli was so great to work with as my wedding dessert vendor! I wanted an assorted sweets table, and she was able to provide a variety of flavors - chocolate, peanut butter, lemon, key lime, strawberry, coffee. I wanted a little bit of something for everyone. The mini treats were adorable and delicious! Keli pitched the idea to me to also decorate the treats with special fondant imagery. That idea had not occurred to me but ended up being my favorite part. I asked her to create fondant of movie imagery because my husband and I met at a movie rental store - and she nailed it! I got such a kick out of it. I asked the photographer to take pictures of the dessert table because I loved it so much. I took some of the desserts home for leftovers and days later, I still smiled at the fondant and enjoyed the treats. Keli gave me exactly the sweets table that I had envisioned. It was perfect and delicious. I recommend Bakery28 for weddings but also as a delicious bakery!
I usually just get the chocolate croissants. The macaroons are also good

Visited here a few weeks ago and the girl who works in the front is one of the nicest and happiest people you'll ever meet. Their desserts are so SO delicious!! I got the sated caramel brownie for a friend, a vanilla cupcake and lemon bread slice for my husband, and a vegan coconut cupcake for myself. Very fairly priced for how cute and delicious they are. The girl even gave me a free macaroon on the house which made my day! And you know I ate that as soon as I got in the car lol 10/10 would totally recommend to anybody who wants a quick bite or needs a cake/dessert made for them! They also have coffee and pastries and croissants, more breakfast-y kind of items.

If you haven't been to Bakery 28, you are missing a huge treat. An award winning baker/owner, amazing pastries, coffee/tea at cute little tables, fantastic sweets, great customer service, and wonderful cakes and cupcakes. My regular choices are the almond croissants and the scones and the beautiful little sweets on the bottom shelf on the right. Say hi to Gabrielle when you go, and experience the best baked goods ever! I highly recommend everyone goes here.
Most bakeries have nothing for vegans. This bakery has an entire display case with nothing but amazing vegan desserts. Best vegan desserts I have eaten in years!

Bakery 28 was recommended for a special cake and cookies.  I had an excellent experience with Keli and the rest of the staff there.  Clear communication, ease of transaction, and all items turned out better than we could have imagined!

The Blush Red Velvet was delicious!  Cookies were perfect...not dry or crumbly.  Not to mention all were decorated exactly as we envisioned!

The young man we celebrated is now serving our country.  I appreciate Bakery 28's assistance with this!
Rude customer service. Walked in there and the lady acted like I was even in the store like I know you see me.
delicious cute place

Come for the coffee & croissants, but you can't leave without a sweet treat for later! Personally my weakness is the macarons... I feel like every time I've visited there is a new flavor selection!

My friend with dietary restrictions was thrilled to see *vegan* as well as *plant-based* options!
This is a very nice bakery/cafe! Great selection of desserts. It is a great place to relax with friends while eating some sweets and drinking coffee.

Stopped in at Bakery 28 for the first time after dinner at the Harp & Crown across the street this evening, 3-16-21. First of all, it smells heavenly when you walk through the door. It was around 5:30 when we arrived, and according to Google they close at 6, but they were still obviously working in the kitchen because the smells were fresh. The atmosphere is clean, fresh, and chic, and the cakes and desserts in the cases look absolutely astounding and irresistible. They have a large selection of vegan and gluten free options which my date was enthusiastic about. She ended up ordering a coconut gluten free cupcake, and I ordered one of the mini "Girl Scout Peanut Butter" cheesecakes (capped with part of a Girl Scout Tagalong, as well as a Key Lime tart. Both the cheesecake and the tart were scrumptious - absolutely devine. I sampled my date's cupcake and it was also delicious. Will plan to drop in again if we're ever back in Cornelius.
Fantastic ! Wow, best croissants I have ever tasted, wonderful coffee drinks and friendly service!
Beautiful desserts. Friendly staff. I stop by here occasionally  driving from Huntersville  to Mooresville. I've tried about every dessert so far. Creme brulee is great.

Excellent bakery, this is the ONLY bakery we use in town. We also love to support a local and woman owned small business!

They carry traditional bakery items, higher caliber items such as domes and petit fours. They always have a selection of vegan, vegetarian and gluten free options.

Favorite items:
ALMOND TOFFEE (incredibly addictive and the perfect not too hard texture)
Croissants (plan & almond)
Napoleon
Cake balls (dangerously good!)
Cookie cake
The little domes and other little items in the refrigerated display
Cookie Yule Log

They have hands down the best croissants in town! Some days they sell out very early as it appears not to be a secret.

We have had a few specialty items made including a birthday cake for a relative that was a Swedish Princess cake. Even though it is not a listed option on their website Chef Keli was able to whip it up for us with a couple days notice. She even dyed the marzipan to the birthday gal's favorite color :)

At Christmas, we ordered a tray of cookies to give to a local vet's office. They totally knocked it out of the park the tray was a perfect mix of many different items they carry cookies, brownies, petite fours. The office we gave it to LOVED it. Chef Keli and her team even created super adorable dog puns to put on the tray. The vet's office employees were passing the box around to take down Bakery 28's info so they could use them in the future. It was a smash hit!

Employees are very helpful and friendly. The whole experience and shop is a very happy helpful place.

The cookies we ordered for a in-house-get-together we're AWFUL! I'm not super picky when it comes to sweets but not even the hottest coffee would soften these Christmas cut outs we ordered WEEKS in advance! Half of them weren't even themed Christmas! It was a company "plug" of these tacky looking 7- Eleven looking coffee cups. $110 down the drain and the girl at that's counter was absolutely miserable. If you don't like working there QUIT.

Would not recommend going to Bakery 28 I am giving a one-star review because I can't give zero stars, I called the bakery and I got hung up on when I asked for their cupcakes flavors, then I went into the bakery today and I wasn't greeted and the women behind the counter ignored my presents in the bakery and continued to make coffee, and I stood at the front counter for 4-5 minutes and I was still not asked if I wanted anything. So I left and went to another bakery right around the corner (Sweet Cakes bakery). Where I was greeted right away and I got 12 amazing cupcakes and Cake pops. And I called back later that night and ordered my Wedding Cake from Sweet Cakes

Very impressed with a birthday cake for a big 4-0 celebration.  It turned out better than I could have hoped for.  It was ready on time and customer service was excellent.  I would highly recommend them for special occasion cakes.

The bakery and the baked goods are beautiful. Extremely friendly staff, the owner herself helped me. I bought a couple oatmeal creme cookies that were stellar! I also got a free cookie just for posting a selfie with their mascot out front. Go!
Keli you did it again, the cake was one of the Best Ever, not only beautiful but moist and delicious!!!!

Kelli at Bakery 28 was absolutely phenomenal to work with! Not only was she incredibly sweet & easy to talk to, but she was able to understand and create the exact cake that I had pictured in my head for my parents 60th birthday surprise! Not only was the decor STUNNING but the flavor of the cake was to die for! Every detail was carefully thought out and was perfect. I know who I'll be contacting for all my future dessert needs!
One of the few places with a good GF cupcake. I wish they offered more GF because it doesn't taste weird! Bonus, it is also vegan and if you're just vegan there's more options which is nice.

Ordered their toffee cheesecake for a special occasion, BEST cheesecake ever & their customer service is top notch.  We've purchased multi goodies, all are absolutely delicious & fresh.  Please support this local gem!
Beautiful cakes ay reasonable prices!
Keli suggested a Vanilla Summer Berry cake for our special occasion. The cake looked fantastic and tasted even better. Thanks we will be back for more.
Delicious cakes, brownies and muffins!!

Absolutely beautiful inside & so welcoming! Every pastry, cookie, cake & every item are so creative & look perfect but not only that they are delicious & I know personally I have never eaten anything, anywhere that is better! How wonderful to have Keli & her bakery in Cornelius. Her talent is unbelievable!! You need to try it, you'll be glad you did & will make many trips back!
Fantastic! Make sure you stop if you are in town.
Amazing sweets
